subTitle: Quick and Easy Multi-Rail Schedule Lookup.
webDescription: Easily check Taiwan Railways, High-Speed Rail, and Taoyuan Airport MRT schedules. Get real-time train status, delay alerts, historical search, fare inquiries, and ticket booking guidance for a smoother commute or trip.
thsrPageDescription: Quickly check Taiwan High-Speed Rail schedules. Access real-time train status, historical searches, fare inquiries, and free seat car indicators for a more convenient commute.
tymcPageDescription: Easily check Taoyuan Airport MRT schedules. Get real-time train status, historical searches, and fare inquiries for a seamless commute or hassle-free airport transfer.
featuresPageDescription: Explore key features, user guides, and learn how to install the website as an app for a faster and more convenient browsing experience.
updatesPageDescription: Stay updated with the latest announcements, version releases, and new features of the website.
announcementTrOrderV1: The 'Booking Redirection' service assists you in quickly navigating to the official TRA or THSR websites and automatically pre-fills the selected train information. On mobile devices, the system defaults to launching the '台鐵 e 訂通' (TRA e-Booking) or 'T-EX Mobile' apps. If you prefer web-based booking, you can disable 'Prioritize APP Booking' in the sidebar (≡) settings.

The THSR booking service is currently integrated with real-time seat availability data; the booking button only appears when seats are available. For TRA, this feature will be enhanced as soon as the MOTC TDX Platform provides more comprehensive data.

Please note that due to data source limitations, the seat availability information displayed on this site may differ slightly from actual records. All final results are subject to the official railway systems. Thank you for your understanding.
sameStationMsg: 'Departure Station' and 'Arrival Station' cannot be the same.
datetimeNotAllowMsg: You can only search for timetables within two months from today. The date you selected was out of range, so it has been reset to today. Showing results for {{date}}.
sameQueryMsg: You are querying too fast! Please try again later.
arrivalTimeAccuracyMsg: (Please allow 0-3 minutes variance in arrival time.)
noTrainDataTitleMsg: No train information found! There are two possible scenarios:
noTrainInThisTimeMsg: The departure time set is too late and there are no more scheduled trips.
noTrainStopBetweenStationsMsg: There are no trains stopping between these two stations.
noTrainDataDueToApiErrorMsg: System anomaly, please try again later or notify the system administrator.
disclaimerMsg: The data is sourced from the 'TDX Platform'. The information provided on this site is for reference only. Please refer to the official announcements for accurate details.
feedbackDescription: This system is independently developed and aims to provide a simple and fast timetable lookup service for various railways. It is not an official platform. If you have any questions or suggestions regarding the system, feel free to click the button below to submit feedback.
pwaIntro: App-like usage experience for enhanced user experience!
pwaIOSStep1: Tap the 'Share' button in the browser.
pwaStep2: Find and Tap 'Add to Home Screen'.
adMsg: Taiwan Railways/High-Speed Rail data is now being charged. We use ads to reduce some of the burden, and we ask for your understanding.
pageOnlyTwMsg: This page is temporarily unavailable in languages other than Traditional Chinese.
orderFailMsg: Booking redirectfailed, please try again later.
businessSeatAlertMsg: Only business seats are available. Do you want to proceed with booking?
typhoonAlertMsg: Due to the impact of the typhoon, please refer to the latest announcements from Taiwan Railways and High-Speed Rail for the latest updates on train operations and suspensions.
eTicketAlertMsg: Do not board with electronic tickets (such as EasyCard/iPASS) or periodic tickets.
